articles.title: Penn State and the Eight-Year Itch - Sports Illustrated
articles.description: In 2004 and 2012, Penn State confronted turning points with confident player leadership. How will the 2020 Lions respond?
articles.content:
In 2004, Penn State faced a crisis of offense. In 2012, Penn State faced a crisis of existence. In 2020, Penn State faces a crisis of confidence.
Those previous teams rose from their crises, girded … [+5107 chars]
